definition: tears of blood (symbol of extreme suffering)/blood and tears

sentences.english: This is really a drenched in blood tragedy.
sentences.chinese: 這真是一個浸透了血淚的悲劇。

sentences.english: People shall not suffer in vain.
sentences.chinese: 人民的血淚不能白流的。

sentences.english: This poem was the accusation mixed with blood and tears of the numerous Jiyue performers.
sentences.chinese: 這是千萬樂舞伎人的血淚控訴。

sentences.english: I didn't put my blood, sweat and tears into this project for nothing.
sentences.chinese: 我沒有把我的血淚斑斑，成爲這個項目的想法。

sentences.english: The monarch could not save her and hid his face in fear;
sentences.chinese: 君王掩面救不得，回看血淚相和流。

sentences.english: Not long for the blood drip into the red beans, endless Liu Chunhua full picture floor spring.
sentences.chinese: 滴不盡相思血淚拋紅豆，開不完春柳春花滿畫樓。

sentences.english: Don't use the blood for blood through lessons and lessons to be free.
sentences.chinese: 別用鮮血換教訓應借教訓免血淚。

definition: scene which recalls past memories (idiom)/evocative of the past/reminiscent/to arouse deep feelings
to recount/to narrate/to give an account of
